overview: Can you imagine living your whole life without any facial expression? How would you express yourself? Smile for the Camera follows Emma, an upbeat, hardworking woman with an infectious personality, who has been unable to move her facial muscles since birth. She can't smile, frown, wink or move her eyes. Emma, in her uniquely quirky spirit, delves in to her past, exploring the challenges she has faced while living with this condition, as well as celebrating her achievements and exploring her relationship with her daughter.
title: Smile for the Camera
